blocks.text: The Perfect North Beach Pizza Pilgrimage

blocks.markdown: Since you're staying in North Beach for your **March 2026** visit, I filtered out the Mission spots we usually go to. This is your neighborhood pizza guide.

items.name: Tony's Pizza Napoletana
items.why: Multiple pizza styles, James Beard award-winning. The coal-fired Margherita is insane. Get there at 4:30pm to avoid the 2-hour line.

items.name: Golden Boy Pizza
items.why: Thick Sicilian slices. Cash only. The square pepperoni is legendary. Go at 2pm (off-peak) or 11pm (late night).

items.name: Pizzeria Delfina
items.why: Neapolitan-style, wood-fired. The clam pizza is wild. Easier to get into than Tony's.

items.event: Tony's Pizza (arrive early to skip line)
Golden Boy (off-peak, grab a square slice)

blocks.text: Pro tip: Tony's takes reservations for parties of 6+. If you're solo, go right when they open at 4:30pm.

items.text: Book Tony's if you have 6+ people
